body_html: Are log() and inv() well-defined for sparse tensors? Also, doesn't exp() make the whole tensor dense? (Or do other frameworks deal with the implicitly-zero elements differently in those cases?)
body_text: Are log() and inv() well-defined for sparse tensors? Also, doesn't exp() make the whole tensor dense? (Or do other frameworks deal with the implicitly-zero elements differently in those cases?)
body: Are `log()` and `inv()` well-defined for sparse tensors? Also, doesn't `exp()` make the whole tensor dense? (Or do other frameworks deal with the implicitly-zero elements differently in those cases?)
